targets.query:
inverterPower = from(bucket:"data-realtime")
|>range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|>filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "I_AC_Power_computed")
|> drop(columns:["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "position", "_field"])

meterPower = from(bucket:"data-realtime")
|>range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|>filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "M_AC_Power_A")
|> drop(columns:["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "position", "_field"])

consumption = join(tables: {inverterPower: inverterPower, meterPower: meterPower}, on: ["_time"])
|>map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
    _value: (r._value_inverterPower - r._value_meterPower)
}))
|> yield(name: "consumption_power")

import "experimental"
import "date"
OffsetStart = experimental.addDuration(d: -10h, to: date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1d))

from(bucket:"data-realtime")
|>range(start: OffsetStart, stop: now())
|>filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "I_AC_Energy_WH_computed")
|>spread()

import "experimental"
import "date"
OffsetStart = experimental.addDuration(d: -10h, to: date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1d))

from(bucket:"data-realtime")
|>range(start: OffsetStart, stop: now())
|>filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "M_Exported_A_computed")
|>spread()

inverterPower = from(bucket:"data-realtime")
|>range(start: -10m, stop: now())
|>filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "I_AC_Power_computed")
|> drop(columns:["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "position", "_field"])

meterPower = from(bucket:"data-realtime")
|>range(start: -10m, stop: now())
|>filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "M_AC_Power_A")
|> drop(columns:["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "position", "_field"])

consumption = join(tables: {inverterPower: inverterPower, meterPower: meterPower}, on: ["_time"])
|>map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
    _value: (r._value_inverterPower - r._value_meterPower)
}))
|> yield(name: "consumption_power")

from(bucket:"data-realtime")
|>range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|>filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "sunspec_power_meter")
|>filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "M_AC_Power_A")

import "experimental"
import "date"
OffsetStart = experimental.addDuration(d: -10h, to: date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1d))

from(bucket:"data-realtime")
|>range(start: OffsetStart, stop: now())
|>filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "M_Imported_A_computed")
|>spread()

from(bucket:"data-realtime")
|>range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|>filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "sunspec_inverter")
|>filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "I_AC_Frequency_computed")

from(bucket: "data-realtime")
|>range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|>filter(fn:(r) => r._field == "I_Status")
|>sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
|>unique(column: "_value")
